body:
This PR is ready to merge, approved by @xyuanlu and @qqu0127 
Final Commit Message:

### Unnecessary log removal.
Remove unnecessary logs to clean up code in Helix.

> LGTM.. what does committer role mean?

Committers can merge code. I have been a committer for a long time, just forgot to add my name to this file. :)
Can we first create feature-branch? Then start working from their.

This change is ready to me merged. Approved by @qqu0127 
Commit message:
Add new submodule meta client - a generic metadata client

This PR is ready to be merged, approved by @somecodemonkey @cliffordfajardo       
Final commit message:
## Add support for optional identity token source in helix-front (#2235)
During helix-front login, optionally request an identity token
from a configurable identity token API.

This PR is ready to merge, approved by @desaikomal 

Commit message:
Upgrade dependencies to fix vulnerability issues in helix-rest, test improvement and config typo fix.
Looks like org.eclipse.jetty:jetty-server is up-to-date now, so this is no longer needed.

Could you please provide a little bit more detail regarding the unclean logic? 

Thanks!

This PR is ready to be merged, approved by @somecodemonkey       
Final commit message:
## Identity Token Cookie (#2250)
Set a cookie containing the Identity Token if 
an Identity Token Source is configured for helix-front.

> qq: do you need to update the description of the review?

Thanks, description updated.

This PR is ready to merge, approved by @desaikomal 
Commit message:

Remove the github action maven.xml since it is covered by Helix-CI and Helix-PR-CI. Also upgrade maven plugin version.

This PR is ready to be merged. Approved by @qqu0127 
Final commit message:
Add listener interfaces and config class for MetaClientInterface

The default behavior of HelixManager is trying to reconnect if the
zookeeper connection fails. It won't trigger a cleanup if you don't
explicitly call disconnect.

Best Regards,
Jiajun


On Thu, Oct 27, 2022 at 10:54 PM joyes ***@***.***> wrote:

> Describe the bug
>
> I use HelixManagerFactory.getZKHelixManager(String clusterName, String
> instanceName,
> InstanceType type, String zkAddr, HelixManagerStateListener stateListener)
> to create HelixManager,Then cut off the network between the host and
> zookeeper,The log shows that zookeeper client is disconnected,but the
> HelixManagerStateListenerOnDisconnected has never been called.
> To Reproduce
>
>    1. Run worker code
>
> public static void main(String[] args) {
>     try {
>           HelixManager helixManager = HelixManagerFactory.getZKHelixManager("clusterName",
>                 "192.168.1.100_8080",  InstanceType.PARTICIPANT,  "192.168.1.200:2181",
>                 new HelixManagerStateListener(){
>                    @Override
> 	          public void onConnected(HelixManager helixManager) throws Exception {
> 		          System.out.println("HelixManager successfully connected");
> 	          }
>
> 	          @Override
> 	          public void onDisconnected(HelixManager helixManager, Throwable error) throws Exception {
> 		          System.out.println("HelixManager disconnected-->" + error.getMessage());
> 	          }
>           });
>           helixManager.connect();
>       } catch (Exception e) {
> 	      e.printStackTrace();
>       }
> }
>
>
>    1. cut off the network between the host and zookeeper
>
> Prevent worker(192.168.1.100) access On zk's server(192.168.1.200)
>
> iptables -I INPUT -s 192.168.1.100 -j DROP
>
>

> <https://github.com/apache/helix/issues/2261>, or unsubscribe

> .

This PR is ready to merge, approved by @NealSun96 

Commit message:
Fix potential race condition issue in unit test and other improvement.

> trying

During worker reconnection, The controller will monitor that the worker is disconnected, Will be rebalance,  The same partition task is performed in two workers. so Whether to associate worker reconnection with controller monitoring to avoid this situation?

When helixmanager.disconnet is called, the existing partition on the
instance shall be transite to OFFLINE state. I remember that the Helix
participant cancels any ongoing state transition during disconnection, but
I'm not 100% sure about the detailed behavior.

On the other hand, if network disconnection happens before (or without)
HelixManager.disconnect, then from controller perspective, the participant
is gone after ZK timeout. It will rebalance and trigger state transition on
a new instance. The disconnected instance is partitioned from the rest of
the cluster. So any partitions or ongoing tasks are not visible to the
controller.
Overall, participant connectivity is the fundamental assumption in the
Helix controller, so everything regarding the participant relies on the
active ZK connection.

To avoid parallel and duplicate running tasks, one way is to add a handler
to HelixManager.Ondisconnect callback. In the handler, it is possible to
cancel the task if it has not been automatically done by the Helix
participant (as I said, I suspect auto-cancel will be triggered but I'm not
certain).

Best Regards,
Jiajun

Commit message:
Improve Helix build tooling and CI

This PR is ready to be merged, approved by @somecodemonkey         
Final commit message:
## Send Identity Token from helix-front to helix-rest (#2259)
If an identity token source is configured.

This PR is ready to merge, approved by @junkaixue 
Commit message:
Add back revision number in each child pom.xml to maintain compatibility with gradle build system.

This PR is ready to merge, approved by @xyuanlu 

Commit message: 
Add license and organization fields in pom file to be compliant with open source convention and work with maven tooling.

This PR is ready to be merged, approved by @mgao0  
Final commit message:
## Add default config for TOKEN_EXPIRATION_KEY (#2264)
Used to parse the optional helix-front identity token source response.

This PR is ready to be merged, approved by @mgao0  
Final commit message:
## Configurable Custom CA Bundle for helix-front (#2271 )
 Add support for a configurable custom certificate authority bundle to helix-front.

This PR is ready to be merged, approved by @somecodemonkey 
Final commit message:
## Cluster deletion confirmation for helix-front (#2274)
Help ensure that a clusters is only deleted 
when the user really intends to delete that cluster.

This PR is ready to be merged, approved by @somecodemonkey  
Final commit message:
## Guard against unwanted prefix and postfix space characters (#2276)
Trim mapFields strings to resolve prefix space issue in helix-front.
